Html:
I would like to deploy KeePass Password Manager. I am having two issues with this deployment. First, the Install Updates seems to require admin credentials. This occurs regardless of if I use the msi package published from their site or installer exe (sort of expected exe to do this). Does anyone have suggestions, tips, or tricks for this issue?

When i do give it admin credentials, i seem to be getting a 80070667 error. The only switches i've tried are /silent and /verysilent with the MSI package. Any thoughts?
NVM, i was doing too much. I just removed all command line parameters and removed the "can request user input" options and it installed straight away.
Effectively, you don't have to do any things to get update to install silently. Wsus do it by itself.
